Name: -1_certain_secular_state_policies
Representative_Docs: ['Relating to certain general definitions in the Code Construction Act.', 'GENITAL MUTILATION OF A CHILD -- Amends existing law to provide for the crime of genital mutilation in certain instances and to provide certain exemptions.', 'As introduced, prohibits this state and any political subdivision of this state, or any official of this state or a political subdivision, from creating, enforcing, or endorsing policies that respect or promote non-secular self-asserted sex-based identity narratives, sexual orientation orthodoxy, or non-secular marriage doctrine because the policies fail the Lemon test, as established by the United States Supreme Court in Lemon v. Kurtzman, 403 U.S. 602 (1971).']

Name: 0_sex_laws_based_purposes
Representative_Docs: ['Relating to the detainment and housing of juveniles and inmates based on biological sex.', "This resolution expresses the sense of the Senate that (1) for purposes of federal law, an individual's sex means the individual's biological sex at birth; and (2) distinctions between the sexes are justified in certain settings, laws, and policies.", "This resolution expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that (1) for purposes of federal law, a person's sex means the person's biological sex at birth; and (2) distinctions between the sexes are justified in certain settings, laws, and policies."]

Name: 1_introduced_title_conforming_statutes
Representative_Docs: ['Introduced; Referred to Committee 2/5/20', 'Introduced; Referred to Committee 1/29/20', 'Introduced 1/2/20']

Name: 2_state_relating_certain_provisions
Representative_Docs: ['Enacting the Kansas protection of pensions and businesses against ideological interference act, relating to ideological boycotts involving environmental, social or governance standards, requiring KPERS to divest from and prohibiting state contracts or the deposit of state moneys with entities engaged in such boycotts as determined by the state treasurer and prohibiting discriminatory practices in the financial services industry based on such boycotts.', 'AN ACT relating to the administration of government; specifying requirements for the hiring and retention of investment managers, trustees and fiduciaries who invest state funds as specified; specifying proxy voting requirements for investment managers, trustees and fiduciaries who invest state funds; providing definitions; making conforming amendments; specifying applicability; and providing for an effective date.', 'A bill for an act relating to public contracts, public fund investing, and lending practices with certain companies that engage in economic boycotts based on environmental, social, or governance criteria, and including effective date and applicability provisions.']

Name: 3_act_identity_section_gender identity
KeyBERT: ['gender identity', 'sexual orientation', 'relating gender', 'gender', 'act relating', 'transgender', 'discrimination', 'act act', 'asserted sex', 'sex based']
Representative_Docs: ['A bill for an act relating to curricula offered by school districts that include instruction relating to gender identity.', 'A BILL for an Act to create and enact a new chapter to title 14 of the North Dakota Century Code, relating to nonsecular self-asserted sex-based identity narratives, to prohibit the state from creating or enforcing policies that directly or symbolically respect nonsecular self-asserted sex-based identity narratives or sexual orientation orthodoxy pursuant to the establishment clause of the First Amendment to the United States Constitution and section 3 of article I of the Constitution of North Dakota; to provide for the continued enforcement of secular marriage policies; to prohibit discrimination for nonsecular beliefs pursuant to the free exercise clause of the First Amendment to the United States Constitution and section 3 of article I of the Constitution of North Dakota.', 'A bill for an act relating to instruction relating to gender identity in the curriculum provided to students enrolled in elementary education programs.']

Name: 4_department_child_requires_data
Representative_Docs: ['Requires the statewide child fatality review coordinator to provide a data collection form to each local child fatality review team.', 'Requires the department of child services (department) to include in its annual report certain additional information concerning child fatalities.', 'Requires the department to conduct at least one unannounced home visit each week while a child is on a trial home visit.']

Name: 5_rights_federal_safety_national
Representative_Docs: ['A bill to authorize funding for, and increase accessibility to, the National Missing and Unidentified Persons System, to facilitate data sharing between such system and the National Crime Information Center database of the Federal Bureau of Investigation, to provide incentive grants to help facilitate reporting to such systems, and for other purposes.', "A resolution establishing a Women's Bill of Rights to reaffirm legal protections afforded to women under Federal law.", "Establishing a Women's Bill of Rights to reaffirm legal protections afforded to women under Federal law."]

Name: 6_transgender_related_requirements_individuals
Representative_Docs: ['To provide requirements related to the eligibility of transgender individuals from serving in the Armed Forces.', 'A bill to provide requirements related to the eligibility of individuals who identify as transgender from serving in the Armed Forces.', 'To provide requirements related to the eligibility of individuals who identify as transgender from serving in the Armed Forces.']
